me apuru satahana liya ewima gana wijesekara mahathata ‘mal kakulu’ pa්ranamaya puda karana athara wasantha wishuwaya yedena dinaya gana da sandahanak karanu kamaththemi. 2012 di meya yedenne marthu 20 dinata ha sapthambar 22 dinataya. 2007 di meya marthu 21 ha sapthambar 23 dinata yedina.

mese rogi wu sirisa athara 140k pamana dikoya mulika rohala wetha pamina thibu athara owun atharin 31k newasikawa prathikara kirima sadaha rohalata athulath kara thibina.ee athara kanthawan 22k ha 09k piriminya.anekuth rogin rohal bhahira anshayen prathikara labimen pasu pitawa gos thibe.prathikara labu kisidu pudgalayekuge thaththwaya barapathala nowana bawa dikoya mulika rohale waidya adhikari nihal wirasuruya mahatha pawasiya.ihatha thaththwaya pilibadawa ema pradeshaya bhara mahajana saukhya parikshakawarayagen kala wimasimakadi pawasuwe ema aagamika uthsawa kamituwa mewan dansalak laba dima sambandhawa thama danuwath kara nomathi bawath awasarayakin thorawa sidukala me katayuththa samibandhawa kowil paripalana kamituwa sambandhayen parikshanayakin pasu naithika piyawara gakanimata katayuthu karana bawathya..
